entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_38_olivia_bain.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_43: I received a comm. from my son, Civius. He said that he has quit being a smuggler and is on his way home. Thank you!
entries.s_44: Please, help my son find a way out of his life as a smuggler.
entries.s_48: My son, Civius, is working in that bunker over there. They refine a spice known as ryll that some people use as a recreational drug. I want you to go into that bunker, find my son, and convince him to leave that life and come home.
